job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtSummaryltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltemgtLocation Pasadena CA and Austin TXltemgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAs Site Reliability Engineer you will be responsible for ensuring the scalability availability and security of a largescale globally distributed hybrid cloud infrastructureltpgtltpgtRequirementsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtBS in Computer Science or equivalent experienceltligtltligtStrong knowledge of LinuxUnix System internalsltligtltligtExperience in troubleshooting and performance tuning of largescale systemsltligtltligtSystem automation experienceltligtltligtA thorough understanding of how the internet worksltligtltligtExperience in operating troubleshooting and scaling production systemsltligtltligtWriting code is strongly emphasizedltligtltligtExperience in web application stacks proxies load balancers and firewallsltligtltligtAWS experience is a plusltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtBenefitsltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtCompetitive salary and bonus program in an entrepreneurial environmentltligtltligtTopnotch health dental and vision insuranceltligtltligt401k plan with matching contributionltligtltligtProfessional TrainingltligtltligtGenerous paid time off plan plus paid holidaysltligtltligtFrequent company sponsored lunches happy hours fun events and plenty of snacks and drinksltligtltligtCasual work environmentltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtSupplyframe is an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability protected Veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
